title: Jardiniere, 1760s
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Eight-sided, horizontal form on four short feet; handles on left and right sides. White ground decorated with ochre bands at rim and bottom edge; polychrome scene of chinaman sitting amidst foliage on one side, bird facing dog (?) on the other; handles decorated with speckled blue, ochre, and green glaze. White interior.

tombstone.epitaph: Jardiniere, 1760s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-7.
